name: Dexalot
highlight: Dexalot is a central limit order book exchange aiming at bringing the traditional centralized exchange user experience without compromising on decentralization and transparency.
summary: As the first decentralized exchange on Avalanche with a central limit order book, Dexalot offers users a non-custodial and transparent decentralized trading environment while rivaling the look and feel of centralized exchanges. Initially building on the Avalanche C-chain, Dexalot also has 100% compatibility with the mature Ethereum Virtual Machine technolgy as an Avalanche Subnet. With a low cost of deployment and operation, Dexalot boasts transaction speeds with 1-2 second finality, plus transactional throughput that can process thousands of transactions per second. With Dexalot, you truly own your trade.
